```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(hrbrthemes)

```

```{r}

fest <- read.csv("panorama-des-festivals(2).csv", encoding = "UTF-8", sep = ";")

```

```{r}
fest <- fest %>%
  group_by(Région) %>% 
  count(Domaine, name = "nbr")
```

```{r}
    ggplot(fest, aes(fill=Domaine, y=nbr, x=Région)) + 
    geom_bar(position="stack", stat="identity")

```
